>  This is the only thing in 1.0 I am not hyped for... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Let's wait and reserve judgment on that. Apparently, they heavily reworked it, making it [more like an old abandoned military complex](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111967-Squadcast-Summary-%282015-02-28%29-Insert-Witty-Edition-Title-Here-Edition). SOMETHING has to be in its place, because career mode was originally designed to have four levels. They hacked it down to three at the last minute, making the jump in costs between levels harder and higher than it was supposed to be.

> 
> We know the release won't be here for at least 3-4 days, and they won't be giving more info/pics/vids for 3-4 days, so there isn't anything to be hyped about.

3-4 days? Realistically, this train's probably going to run the longest it ever has. I'm expecting about two-weeks (from announcement) until full release.

> 
> 3-4 days? Realistically, this train's probably going to run the longest it ever has. I'm expecting about two-weeks (from announcement) until full release.

I meant that this weekend is Easter weekend, not that I am expecting the release soon.

> 
> 3-4 days? Realistically, this train's probably going to run the longest it ever has. I'm expecting about two-weeks (from announcement) until full release.

I expect it to last two weeks at least. It's a pretty big update.

Edit: I have this thing whenever theres a new update going to come out I have a really strong urge to play the game. Then I go back to the forum and there it is! The new update!

So If I post anything new from now on, be prepared.
